description: Try our easy to follow Curly Pear & Chicken Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Curly Pear & Chicken Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl, whisk vinegar, mustard, honey and remaining oil together. Season, drizzle over salad, scatter over almonds and serve.
